name.description: Name of the ZIP unpacker app.

description.message: Open ZIP files in Files app.
description.description: Short description of the ZIP unpacker app.

mountErrorTitle.description: Title of a notification with a mounting error message.

existsErrorMessage.description: Error message when the archive is already mounted.

otherErrorMessage.message: The archive format is not supported, or the file is broken.

passphraseCancel.description: Short name of the passphrase cancel button.

passphraseRemember.description: Short text of a checkbox whether the password should be remembered
